name: Balanced
description: Smart mix of cost and quality. Premium models where reasoning matters most (Coder, Analyser), efficient models for coordination.

Orchestrator.reason: Coordination is straightforward — GPT-4o-mini (fast + cheap), Claude Sonnet, or Gemini Flash

Analyser.reason: Analysis needs good reasoning — Claude Sonnet 4.6, GPT-4o, or Gemini Pro

Planner.reason: Planning benefits from strong models — Claude Sonnet 4.6, GPT-4o, or DeepSeek V3

SkillAttributer.reason: Task decomposition — GPT-4o-mini (efficient), Claude Sonnet, or Gemini Flash

Coder.reason: Coding quality matters — Claude Sonnet 4.6 (excellent coder), GPT-4o, or DeepSeek V3
